# Configuration


<!-- WARNING: THIS FILE WAS AUTOGENERATED! DO NOT EDIT! -->

## SingleFileWorkflowConfig Class

The
[`SingleFileWorkflowConfig`](https://cj-mills.github.io/cjm-fasthtml-workflow-transcription-single-file/core/config.html#singlefileworkflowconfig)
class provides configuration for the single-file transcription workflow.
It includes settings for: - Workflow identification and routing - Worker
process configuration - UI customization options - Media browser
configuration - Result storage configuration

------------------------------------------------------------------------

<a
href="https://github.com/cj-mills/cjm-fasthtml-workflow-transcription-single-file/blob/main/cjm_fasthtml_workflow_transcription_single_file/core/config.py#L24"
target="_blank" style="float:right; font-size:smaller">source</a>

### SingleFileWorkflowConfig

``` python

def SingleFileWorkflowConfig(
    workflow_id:str='single_file_transcription', worker_type:str='transcription:single_file',
    route_prefix:str='/single_file', stepflow_prefix:str='/flow', media_prefix:str='/media',
    container_id:str='sf-workflow-container', show_progress:bool=True, max_files_displayed:int=50,
    export_formats:List=<factory>, no_plugins_redirect:Optional=None, no_files_redirect:Optional=None,
    sse_poll_interval:float=2.0, gpu_memory_threshold_percent:float=45.0, config_dir:Path=<factory>,
    plugin_config_dir:Path=<factory>, plugin_category:str='transcription', media:BrowserConfig=<factory>,
    storage:StorageConfig=<factory>
)->None:

```

*Configuration for single-file transcription workflow.*

## Usage Examples

``` python
# Create default configuration
config = SingleFileWorkflowConfig()
print(f"Workflow ID: {config.workflow_id}")
print(f"Route prefix: {config.route_prefix}")
print(f"Full stepflow prefix: {config.get_full_stepflow_prefix()}")
print(f"Full media prefix: {config.get_full_media_prefix()}")
```

    Workflow ID: single_file_transcription
    Route prefix: /single_file
    Full stepflow prefix: /single_file/flow
    Full media prefix: /single_file/media
